The Team

Will Essilfie

Will is a graduate of Columbia University where he studied Computer Science and served as a campus publication Editor in Chief as well as working on ADI. He's now working as a Data Scientist in the Bay Area.

Lesley Cordero

Lesley is an ardent advocate for increasing diversity within the technology sector. Studying Computer Science at Columbia, she has been an active member of Columbia Quest Scholars and ADI.

Yefri Gaitan

Yefri is a current Computer Science student at Columbia. He enjoys programming, ramen, and being a committee member for ADI.

Jesús Mora-Valle

Jesús is a Columbia Architecture graduate now working as a 6th grade teacher in San Antonio, Texas. In addition, he works on policy efforts for Latinx communities with UnidosUS.
